tool.name: BiobbCanal
tool.description: : Wrapper for the Canal executable that is part of the Curves+ software suite.

param.name: input_cda_file
param.label: input CDA file
param.help: Input cda file, from Cur+ output. Format: [input].cda

param.name: input_lis_file
param.label: input LIS file
param.help: Input lis file, from Cur+ output. Format: [input].lis

param.name: outname_output_zip_path
param.label: output ZIP name
param.help: zip filename for output files Format: [output].zip

param.name: sele
param.label: Take tool settings:
param.help: Select where tool settings are to be read from

param.name: properties
param.label: Configuration file
param.help: File containing tool settings. See below for the syntax

param.name: jsonstr
param.label: JSON string
param.help: JSON string containing tool settings. See below for the syntax

param.name: bases
param.label: bases
param.help: sequence of bases to be searched for in the I/P data (default is blank, meaning no specified sequence).

param.name: lev1
param.label: lev1
param.help: Lower base level limit (i.e. base pairs) used for analysis.

param.name: lev2
param.label: lev2
param.help: Upper base level limit used for analysis. If lev1 > 0 and lev2 = 0, lev2 is set to lev1 (i.e. analyze lev1 only). If lev1=lev2=0, lev1 is set to 1 and lev2 is set to the length of the oligmer (i.e. analyze all levels).

param.name: nastr
param.label: nastr
param.help: character string used to indicate missing data in .ser files.

param.name: cormin
param.label: cormin
param.help: minimal absolute value for printing linear correlation coefficients between pairs of analyzed variables.

param.name: series
param.label: series
param.help: if True then output spatial or time series data. Only possible for the analysis of single structures or single trajectories.

param.name: histo
param.label: histo
param.help: if True then output histogram data.

param.name: corr
param.label: corr
param.help: if True than output linear correlation coefficients between all variables.

param.name: sequence
param.label: sequence
param.help: sequence of the first strand of the corresponding DNA fragment, for each .cda file. If not given it will be parsed from .lis file.

param.name: binary_path
param.label: binary_path
param.help: Path to Canal executable, otherwise the program wil look for Canal executable in the binaries folder.
